document.full_text: the debate over whether the united states should stage a mini-debt default is largely a political one, although action must be taken on the country's fiscal situation, a top federal reserve official said on thursday.
document.title: fed's plosser: default debate political, not economic
lines_and_colors: the debate over whether the united states should stage a mini-debt default is largely a political one, although action must be taken on the country's fiscal situation, a top federal reserve official said on thursday.
